snippet.title: WORD OF MOUTH STORIES (v1): Discover the Truth behind a Small Town in this Survival Horror Game 5MG
snippet.description:
Don't click here: https://bit.ly/35L4LXh 
Download free and more: 
https://www.5mgsite.com/post/word-of-mouth-stories-v1-discover-the-truth-behind-a-small-town-in-this-survival-horror-game

Word of Mouth Stories is a third-person survival horror game that is being produced by WaquDoo and has a demo version, titled "Vol.1" published on May 29, 2021 on the "itch.io" platform, which is slated to be released on December 21 of the same year, both on that platform and on Steam. The game does not feature an elaborate plot, but addresses a small (and scary) city from the point of view of two different characters, each with a different story to tell.

NEW - 5mg Magazine #4 - 16 PICO-8 Games: https://www.5mgsite.com/magazine
Subscribe and get access to news and our Discord server: https://mailchi.mp/1d6e93f3d1cb/5mg

- Buy a 5MG Channel a coffee for support: https://ko-fi.com/5mgchannel
- Become a Patreon: www.patreon.com/5mg
- 5mg Site: http://www.5mgsite.com
- Twitter: @5mgchannel

Subscribe to the channel, thumbs up the video, share it with your friends and visit our website.

Note¹: This is not a guide, but my experience playing games, sometimes, for the first time.
